meanings.definition: Greeted with a gesture of respect or courtesy.
meanings.sent1: He saluted his teacher by raising his hand in class.
meanings.sent2: The soldier saluted the officer as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat saluted the mouse with a friendly meow.
meanings.sent4: The sun saluted the horizon as it rose in the morning sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers saluted the breeze with a gentle sway.

meanings.definition: Acknowledged or recognized with a formal gesture.
meanings.sent1: The saluted guest received a warm welcome at the party.
meanings.sent2: The saluted dignitary smiled graciously at the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The saluted painting was admired by all visitors.
meanings.sent4: The saluted achievement was celebrated with applause.
meanings.sent5: The saluted hero was honored with a medal.

meanings.sent1: The nation saluted its fallen soldiers on Memorial Day.
meanings.sent2: The crowd saluted the singer with a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The chef saluted the flavors of the dish with a satisfied nod.
meanings.sent4: The artist saluted the beauty of nature in their painting.
meanings.sent5: The students saluted their teacher's dedication with a heartfelt thank you.
